channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: May 17, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: The Israeli military said Friday it recovered the bodies of three hostages — Shani Louk, Amit Bouskila, and Itshak Gelernter — in the Gaza Strip.

item.title: 5 dead in 'exceptionally' strong storm in Houston
item.description: At least five people were killed when a powerful storm tore through Houston on Thursday night, officials said.

item.title: World No. 1 golfer Scottie Scheffler arrested outside PGA Championship
item.description: World No. 1 golfer Scottie Scheffler was arrested and charged with a felony and other counts Friday morning outside the PGA Championship in Louisville, Kentucky. Follow here live updates.

item.title: Diddy allegedly seen assaulting former girlfriend in hotel surveillance video: Report
item.description: Sean "Diddy" Combs was allegedly seen physically assaulting his former girlfriend, Cassie Ventura, in 2016 on hotel surveillance video obtained by CNN.

item.title: May 16, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: Israel called South Africa the "legal arm" of Hamas on Thursday after it accused Israeli forces, in remarks at the International Court of Justice, of failing to protect civilians in the southern Gaza city of Rafah.

item.title: Man charged with murder in suspicious deaths of 3 women in 'complex' case: DA
item.description: Oregon authorities have identified and charged a suspect in the 2023 deaths of three women -- Charity Lynn Perry, 24, Bridget Leanne Webster, 31, and Joanna Speaks, 32.

item.title: Trump defense grills Michael Cohen in hush money trial
item.description: The cross-examination of Michael Cohen, the prosecution's key witness in the Donald Trump criminal hush money trial, will resume Monday. Closing arguments could begin as early as Tuesday.

item.title: Dabney Coleman, actor who specialized in curmudgeons, dies at 92
item.description: Dabney Coleman, the mustachioed character actor who specialized in smarmy villains like the chauvinist boss in “9 to 5” and the nasty TV director in “Tootsie,” has died

item.title: May 16, 2024 - Russia's war in Ukraine
item.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin has met Chinese leader Xi Jinping in Beijing, emboldened by the survival of his wartime economy and Russia's advances in Ukraine.

item.title: WATCH: Army sergeant surprises his sister on her wedding day
item.description: Helena Morgan said she was "totally surprised" when her brother, U.S. Army Sgt. William Watson, flew across the country to walk her down the aisle for her big day.
